titleStmt.title: The garland of good-will divided into three parts : containing many pleasant songs and pretty poems to sundry new notes : with a table to find the names of all the songs / written by T.D.
titleStmt.author: Deloney, Thomas, 1543?-1600.

notesStmt.note: Written by T. Deloney. Cf. BM.
"Some ballads in the third part were certainly by other hands"--DNB.
Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
